Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

ConnectedEntity.description: Represents a remote resource that is connected to the network accessible to this endpoint.
ConnectedEntity.longDescription: This type shall represent a remote resource that is connected to a network accessible to an endpoint.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

EntityLink.description: The link to the associated entity.
EntityLink.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to an entity of the type specified by the description of the EntityType property value.

EntityPciId.description: The PCI ID of the connected entity.
EntityPciId.longDescription: This property shall contain the PCI ID of the connected PCIe entity.

EntityRole.description: The role of the connected entity.
EntityRole.longDescription: This property shall indicate if the specified entity is an initiator, target, or both.

EntityType.description: The type of the connected entity.
EntityType.longDescription: This property shall indicate if type of connected entity.

Identifiers.longDescription: Identifiers for the remote entity shall be unique in the context of other resources that can reached over the connected network.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties contained in this object shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

PciClassCode.description: The Class Code, Subclass, and Programming Interface code of this PCIe function.
PciClassCode.longDescription: This property shall contain the PCI Class Code, Subclass, and Programming Interface of the PCIe device function.

PciFunctionNumber.description: The PCI ID of the connected entity.
PciFunctionNumber.longDescription: This property shall contain the PCI Function Number of the connected PCIe entity.

Endpoint.description: The Endpoint schema contains the properties of an endpoint resource that represents the properties of an entity that sends or receives protocol-defined messages over a transport.
Endpoint.longDescription: This resource contains a fabric endpoint for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

ConnectedEntities.description: All the entities connected to this endpoint.
ConnectedEntities.longDescription: This property shall contain all entities to which this endpoint allows access.

EndpointProtocol.description: The protocol supported by this endpoint.
EndpointProtocol.longDescription: This property shall contain the protocol this endpoint uses to communicate with other endpoints on this fabric.

HostReservationMemoryBytes.description: The amount of memory in bytes that the host should allocate to connect to this endpoint.
HostReservationMemoryBytes.longDescription: This property shall contain the amount of memory in bytes that the host should allocate to connect to this endpoint.

Identifiers.longDescription: Identifiers for this endpoint shall be unique in the context of other endpoints that can reached over the connected network.

Links.description: The links to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This property shall contain links to resources that are related to but are not contained by, or subordinate to, this resource.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

PciId.description: The PCI ID of the endpoint.
PciId.longDescription: This property shall contain the PCI ID of the endpoint.

Redundancy.description: Redundancy information for the lower-level endpoints supporting this endpoint.
Redundancy.longDescription: The values of the properties in this array shall show how this endpoint is grouped with other endpoints for form redundancy sets.

Status.description: The status and health of the resource and its subordinate or dependent resources.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the resource.

enumDescriptions.Both: The entity can both send and receive commands, messages, and other requests to or from other entities on the fabric.
enumDescriptions.Initiator: The entity sends commands, messages, or other types of requests to other entities on the fabric, but cannot receive commands from other entities.
enumDescriptions.Target: The entity receives commands, messages, or other types of requests from other entities on the fabric, but cannot send commands to other entities.

enumDescriptions.Bridge: The entity is a PCI(e) bridge.
enumDescriptions.DisplayController: The entity is a display controller.
enumDescriptions.Drive: The entity is a disk drive.  The EntityLink property, if present, should be a Drive type.
enumDescriptions.NetworkController: The entity is a network controller.  The EntityLink property, if present, should contain an EthernetInterface type.
enumDescriptions.Processor: The entity is a processor device.
enumDescriptions.RootComplex: The entity is a PCI(e) root complex.  The EntityLink property, if present, should be a ComputerSystem type.
enumDescriptions.StorageExpander: The entity is a storage expander.  The EntityLink property, if present, should be a Chassis type.
enumDescriptions.StorageInitiator: The entity is a storage initiator.  The EntityLink property, if present, should be a StorageController type.

Links.description: The links to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This Redfish Specification-described type shall contain links to resources that are related to but are not contained by, or subordinate to, this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

MutuallyExclusiveEndpoints.description: An array of links to the endpoints that may not be used in zones if this endpoint is in a zone.
MutuallyExclusiveEndpoints.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to resources of type Endpoint that cannot be used in a zone if this endpoint is in a zone.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties contained in this object shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

Ports.description: An array of links to the physical ports associated with this endpoint.
Ports.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to resources of type Port that are utilized by this endpoint.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

PciId.longDescription: This type shall describe a PCI ID.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

DeviceId.description: The Device ID of this PCIe function.
DeviceId.longDescription: This property shall contain the PCI Device ID of the PCIe device function.

SubsystemId.description: The Subsystem ID of this PCIe function.
SubsystemId.longDescription: This property shall contain the PCI Subsystem Vendor ID of the PCIe device function.

SubsystemVendorId.description: The Subsystem Vendor ID of this PCIe function.
SubsystemVendorId.longDescription: This property shall contain the PCI Subsystem Vendor ID of the PCIe device function.

VendorId.description: The Vendor ID of this PCIe function.
VendorId.longDescription: This property shall contain the PCI Vendor ID of the PCIe device function.

title: #Endpoint.v1_0_8.Endpoint
